value.description: A simple head-mounted comms computer that slightly enhances an overseer's control bandwidth through basic binharic protocols. This allows them to control more servitors.
A head-mounted computer and signaling array that enhances an overseer's control bandwidth through advanced binharic protocols. This allows them to control more servitors.

An advanced head-mounted computer and signaling array that dramatically enhances an overseer's control bandwidth through superior binharic protocols. This allows the wearer to control many more servitors at once.

A plasteel-weave combat helmet designed for battle overseers. It is embedded with cogitators and signal enhancers that moderately increase the wearer's maximum control bandwidth through sacred binharic rites. This allows the overseer to control more servitors.

A heavy plasteel-weave helmet packed with advanced cogitators and binharic protocols sanctified by the Machine Cult. The tech-priest helmet dramatically amplifies a tech-priest's control bandwidth, but is somewhat less protective than dedicated heavy armor.
A backpack containing servitor control assist cogitators sanctified with binharic protocols. It allows an overseer to control one additional control group.
A backpack containing bandwidth-expansion cogitator and antenna sanctified with advanced binharic protocols. It can increase an overseer's maximum total bandwidth.

A power-assisted armor suit packed with advanced cogitators and binharic protocols sanctified by the Machine Cult. The tech-priest suit dramatically amplifies a tech-priest's control bandwidth, but is somewhat less protective than dedicated heavy armor. The suit's integrated cogitators and signal amplifiers allow the wearer to command vast legions of servitors through sacred Mechanicus rites.
